title: FS/FT/Upgrade: Joe Doyle, Tenney, Ganley, etc.
author: wazoo

posts.post_title: FS/FT/Upgrade: Joe Doyle, Tenney, Ganley, etc.
posts.post_content:
Hey all,
     Hope everyone has been well. Long time no talk! Today I have a few cards that I'm looking either to trade, sell, or upgrade. I have not priced the Ganley or the Tenney, for I wish to upgrade them. 

Doyle (trimmed): sold
McQuillian (no name): sold
Bergen (Polar bear): sold
Sharpe: sold
Lake (possibly trimmed):sold

I am always looking for possible trades. I collect Polar Bear backs that I don't have, hall of famers, and southern leaguers. 

Thanks,
Wazoo
I'm open to offers and trades. Please let me know what you're thinking!
